TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Match extends System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group

summary.span: 表示单个正则表达式匹配的结果。

span.span: Represents the results from a single regular expression match.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象是不可变，并且没有公共构造函数。The object is immutable and has no public constructor. 实例类返回的方法中，表示第一个模式匹配字符串中。An instance of the class is returned by the method and represents the first pattern match in a string. 由表示后续匹配项返回的对象方法。Subsequent matches are represented by objects returned by the method. 此外，对象，它由零个、 一个或多个组成返回的对象方法。In addition, a object that consists of zero, one, or more objects is returned by the method. 如果无法与输入字符串中的某个正则表达式模式匹配方法，它将返回空对象。If the method fails to match a regular expression pattern in an input string, it returns an empty object. 然后，可以使用`foreach`C# 中构造或`For Each`构造在 Visual Basic 进行循环访问集合中。You can then use a `foreach` construct in C# or a `For Each` construct in Visual Basic to iterate the collection. 如果无法与正则表达式模式匹配方法，它将返回对象，它等于。If the method fails to match the regular expression pattern, it returns a object that is equal to . 可以使用属性来确定匹配是否成功。You can use the property to determine whether the match was successful. 下面的示例进行了这方面的演示。The following example provides an illustration. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class/cs/Match1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class/vb/Match1.vb#1)] 如果成功，模式匹配属性包含匹配的子字符串，属性指示从零开始的起始位置的匹配的子字符串在输入字符串中，和属性指示匹配输入字符串中的子字符串的长度。If a pattern match is successful, the property contains the matched substring, the property indicates the zero-based starting position of the matched substring in the input string, and the property indicates the length of matched substring in the input string. 由于单个匹配项可能涉及多个捕获组已返回的属性。Because a single match can involve multiple capturing groups, has a property that returns the . 本身的实例是否等效于第一个对象在集合中，在`Match.Groups[0]`(`Match.Groups(0)`在 Visual Basic 中)，它表示整个匹配项。The instance itself is equivalent to the first object in the collection, at `Match.Groups[0]` (`Match.Groups(0)` in Visual Basic), which represents the entire match. 可以按以下方式来访问在匹配中捕获的组：You can access the captured groups in a match in the following ways: - 您可以循环访问的成员通过使用对象`foreach`(C#) 或`For Each`(Visual Basic 中) 构造。You can iterate the members of the object by using a `foreach` (C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic) construct. - 可以使用属性来检索组的捕获组数。You can use the property to retrieve groups by the number of the capturing group. 请注意，您可以确定哪些编号的组是出现在正则表达式中通过调用实例方法。Note that you can determine which numbered groups are present in a regular expression by calling the instance method. - 可以使用属性来检索组的捕获组的名称。You can use the property to retrieve groups by the name of the capturing group. 请注意，您可以确定哪些已命名的组将出现在正则表达式中通过调用实例方法。Note that you can determine which named groups are present in a regular expression by calling the instance method. ## Examples 下面的示例使用正则表达式`Console\.Write(Line)?`。The following examples use the regular expression `Console\.Write(Line)?`. 正则表达式按如下方式解释：The regular expression is interpreted as follows: ||| |-|-| |控制台\\。编写Console\\.Write|匹配字符串“Console.Write”。Match the string "Console.Write". 请注意，"。"字符将被转义，以便将其解释为文字句点，而不是作为通配符，可匹配任何字符。Note that the "." character is escaped so that it is interpreted as a literal period rather than as a wildcard that matches any character.| |（行）？(Line)?|匹配字符串“Line”的零个或一个匹配项。Match zero or one occurrence of the string "Line".| **示例 1****Example 1** 下面的示例调用方法来检索在输入字符串中的所有模式匹配项。The following example calls the method to retrieve all pattern matches in an input string. 然后循环访问中返回的对象对象显示有关每个匹配项的信息。It then iterates the objects in the returned object to display information about each match. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class/cs/Match2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class/vb/Match2.vb#2)] **示例 2****Example 2** 下面的示例调用和方法来一次检索一个匹配项。The following example calls the and methods to retrieve one match at a time. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class/cs/Match3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class/vb/Match3.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Empty As Match
public: static property System::Text::RegularExpressions::Match ^ Empty { System::Text::RegularExpressions::Match ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Gets the empty group.

summary.span: 所有失败的匹配都返回此空匹配。

span.span: All failed matches return this empty match.
An empty match.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不应该用于确定匹配是否成功。This property should not be used to determine if a match is successful. 请改用`Match.Success`属性 (其继承自)。Instead, use the `Match.Success` property (which is inherited from ).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Groups As GroupCollection

summary.span: 获取由正则表达式匹配的组的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of groups matched by the regular expression.
The character groups matched by the pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正则表达式模式可以包含由括号括起的正则表达式模式的一部分定义的子表达式。A regular expression pattern can include subexpressions, which are defined by enclosing a portion of the regular expression pattern in parentheses. 每个此类子表达式构成一个组。Every such subexpression forms a group. 属性提供访问有关这些子表达式匹配项的信息。The property provides access to information about those subexpression matches. 例如，正则表达式模式`(\d{3})-(\d{3}-\d{4})`，可匹配北美电话号码，有两个子表达式。For example, the regular expression pattern `(\d{3})-(\d{3}-\d{4})`, which matches North American telephone numbers, has two subexpressions. 第一个包含区域代码，包含电话号码的前三位数字。The first consists of the area code, which composes the first three digits of the telephone number. 此组所捕获的正则表达式的第一个部分`(\d{3})`。第二个包含的各个电话号码，其中包含的电话号码的最后七位数字。This group is captured by the first portion of the regular expression, `(\d{3})`.The second consists of the individual telephone number, which composes the last seven digits of the telephone number. 此组所捕获的正则表达式的第二个部分`(\d{3}-\d{4})`。This group is captured by the second portion of the regular expression, `(\d{3}-\d{4})`. 然后可以从检索这两个组返回的对象属性，如以下示例所示。These two groups can then be retrieved from the object that is returned by the property, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.match.groups/cs/groups1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.match.groups/vb/groups1.vb#1)] 返回对象属性是始终有至少一个成员的从零开始的集合对象。The object returned by the property is a zero-based collection object that always has at least one member. 如果正则表达式引擎找不到特定的输入字符串中的所有匹配项的单个属性集合 （索引 0 处的对象） 中的对象设置为`false`和对象属性设置为。If the regular expression engine cannot find any matches in a particular input string, the property of the single object in the collection (the object at index 0) is set to `false` and the object's property is set to . 如果正则表达式引擎可以找到匹配项的第一个元素返回的对象 （索引 0 处的元素）属性包含与整个正则表达式模式匹配的字符串。If the regular expression engine can find a match, the first element of the object (the element at index 0) returned by the property contains a string that matches the entire regular expression pattern. 后续的每个元素，从一个索引上升、 表示非捕获的组，如果正则表达式中包含捕获组。Each subsequent element, from index one upward, represents a captured group, if the regular expression includes capturing groups. 有关详细信息，请参阅的"分组构造和正则表达式对象"部分[的分组构造](~/docs/standard/base-types/grouping-constructs-in-regular-expressions.md)一文。For more information, see the "Grouping Constructs and Regular Expression Objects" section of the [Grouping Constructs](~/docs/standard/base-types/grouping-constructs-in-regular-expressions.md) article. ## Examples 下面的示例尝试匹配与示例字符串的正则表达式模式。The following example attempts to match a regular expression pattern against a sample string. 该示例使用属性来存储通过向控制台显示的匹配项的信息。The example uses the property to store information that is retrieved by the match for display to the console. [!code-cpp[Regex Match, NextMatch, Groups, Captures#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/regex match, nextmatch, groups, captures/cpp/snippet8.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[Regex Match, NextMatch, Groups, Captures#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/regex match, nextmatch, groups, captures/cs/snippet8.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Regex Match, NextMatch, Groups, Captures#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/regex match, nextmatch, groups, captures/vb/snippet8.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match NextMatch() cil managed

summary.span: 从上一个匹配结束的位置（即在上一个匹配字符之后的字符）开始返回一个包含下一个匹配结果的新 对象。

span.span: Returns a new object with the results for the next match, starting at the position at which the last match ended (at the character after the last matched character).

returns.span: 下一个正则表达式匹配。

span.span: The next regular expression match.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是类似于调用再次和传递 (`Index+Length`) 作为新的开始位置。This method is similar to calling again and passing (`Index+Length`) as the new starting position. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不会修改当前实例。This method does not modify the current instance. 相反，它会返回一个新对象，其中包含有关下一个匹配项的信息。Instead, it returns a new object that contains information about the next match. 尝试检索下一个匹配项可能会引发如果匹配操作的超时值生效，并且尝试查找下一个匹配项超过该超时间隔。Attempting to retrieve the next match may throw a if a time-out value for matching operations is in effect and the attempt to find the next match exceeds that time-out interval. ## Examples 下面的示例使用超出第一个匹配项的方法来捕获正则表达式匹配。The following example uses the method to capture regular expression matches beyond the first match. [!code-cpp[Regex Match, NextMatch, Groups, Captures#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/regex match, nextmatch, groups, captures/cpp/snippet8.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[Regex Match, NextMatch, Groups, Captures#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/regex match, nextmatch, groups, captures/cs/snippet8.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Regex Match, NextMatch, Groups, Captures#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/regex match, nextmatch, groups, captures/vb/snippet8.vb#8)]

span.span: A time-out occurred.

para.span: 当通过调用重复的匹配尝试方法中，正则表达式引擎提供空匹配项特殊处理。

span.span: When a match attempt is repeated by calling the method, the regular expression engine gives empty matches special treatment.

para.span: 通常情况下，开始搜索下一个匹配完全上一个匹配项离开的位置。

span.span: Usually, begins the search for the next match exactly where the previous match left off.

para.span: 在空匹配项，但之后方法尝试下一个匹配项之前提前一个字符。

span.span: However, after an empty match, the method advances by one character before trying the next match.

para.span: 此行为可确保正则表达式引擎会通过字符串前进。

span.span: This behavior guarantees that the regular expression engine will progress through the string.

para.span: 否则为在空匹配项不会导致任何向前移动，因为下一个匹配项将在与上一个匹配项，相同的位置开始，它将重复匹配同一个空字符串。

span.span: Otherwise, because an empty match does not result in any forward movement, the next match would start in exactly the same place as the previous match, and it would match the same empty string repeatedly.

para.span: 下面的示例进行了这方面的演示。

span.span: The following example provides an illustration.

para.span: 正则表达式模式\*搜索的零个或多个字母"a"字符串"abaabb"中。

span.span: The regular expression pattern a\* searches for zero or more occurrences of the letter "a" in the string "abaabb".

para.span: 如示例输出所示，搜索未找到六个匹配项。

span.span: As the output from the example shows, the search finds six matches.

para.span: 第一个匹配尝试查找第一个"a"。

span.span: The first match attempt finds the first "a".

para.span: 与完全其中第一个匹配结束，第一个 b; 之前在第二个匹配项开始它查找"a"的零个匹配项，并返回一个空字符串。

span.span: The second match starts exactly where the first match ends, before the first b; it finds zero occurrences of "a" and returns an empty string.

para.span: 第三个匹配项不开始恰好第二个匹配结束的地方，因为返回空字符串的第二个匹配项。

span.span: The third match does not begin exactly where the second match ended, because the second match returned an empty string.

para.span: 相反，它从一个字符开始更高版本之后第一个"b"。

span.span: Instead, it begins one character later, after the first "b".

para.span: 第三个匹配查找两个匹配项的"a"，并返回"aa"。

span.span: The third match finds two occurrences of "a" and returns "aa".

para.span: 第四个匹配尝试结束的地方开始第三个匹配项之前第二个"b"，, 并返回一个空字符串。

span.span: The fourth match attempt begins where the third match ended, before the second "b", and returns an empty string.

para.span: 第五个匹配尝试再次提升一个字符，以便它在第三个"b"之前开始，并返回一个空字符串。

span.span: The fifth match attempt again advances one character so that it begins before the third "b" and returns an empty string.

para.span: 第六个匹配项开始后的最后一个"b"，并再次返回一个空字符串。

span.span: The sixth match begins after the last "b" and returns an empty string again.

[!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.NextMatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.match.nextmatch/cs/nextmatch1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.NextMatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.match.nextmatch/vb/nextmatch1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string Result(string replacement) cil managed
Public Overridable Function Result (replacement As String) As String
abstract member Result : string -> string override this.Result : string -> string

span.span: The replacement pattern to use.

summary.span: 返回对指定替换模式的扩展。

span.span: Returns the expansion of the specified replacement pattern.
The expanded version of the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而方法会在输入字符串中的所有匹配项替换为指定的替换模式中，方法会单个匹配项替换为指定的替换模式。Whereas the method replaces all matches in an input string with a specified replacement pattern, the method replaces a single match with a specified replacement pattern. 因为它对单个匹配项进行操作，还有可能对匹配的字符串执行处理，然后再调用方法。Because it operates on an individual match, it is also possible to perform processing on the matched string before you call the method. `replacement`参数是标准的正则表达式替换模式。The `replacement` parameter is a standard regular expression replacement pattern. 它可以包含原义字符和正则表达式替换项。It can consist of literal characters and regular expression substitutions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[替换](~/docs/standard/base-types/substitutions-in-regular-expressions.md)。For more information, see [Substitutions](~/docs/standard/base-types/substitutions-in-regular-expressions.md). ## Examples 下面的示例将开始和结束带括号的表达式使用括号的连字符。The following example replaces the hyphens that begin and end a parenthetical expression with parentheses. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Result#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.match.result/cs/result1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Result#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.match.result/vb/result1.vb#1)] 正则表达式模式 `--(.+?)--` 的含义如下表所示。The regular expression pattern `--(.+?)--` is interpreted as shown in the following table. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`--`|匹配两个连字符。Match two hyphens.| |`(.+?)`|一个或多个时间，但次数少尽可能匹配任何字符。Match any character one or more times, but as few times as possible. 这是第一个捕获组。This is the first capturing group.| |`--`|匹配两个连字符。Match two hyphens.| 请注意，正则表达式模式`--(.+?)--`使用惰性量符`+?`。Note that the regular expression pattern `--(.+?)--` uses the lazy quantifier `+?`. 如果贪婪限定符`+`使用相反，正则表达式引擎将输入字符串中查找单个匹配项。If the greedy quantifier `+` were used instead, the regular expression engine would find only a single match in the input string. 替换字符串`($1)`替换括在括号中的第一个捕获组匹配。The replacement string `($1)` replaces the match with the first captured group, which is enclosed in parentheses.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 不允许对此模式进行扩展。

span.span: Expansion is not allowed for this pattern.
Substitutions

span.span: A regular expression match equivalent to the one expected.

summary.span: 返回一个与提供的实例等效的 实例，该实例适合在多个线程间共享。

span.span: Returns a instance equivalent to the one supplied that is suitable to share between multiple threads.

returns.span: 适合在多个线程间共享的正则表达式匹配。

span.span: A regular expression match that is suitable to share between multiple threads.
is .
